urls.title: Rail&Fly Germany | Singapore Airlines
urls.description: Stay easily connected by adding Rail & Fly to your flight booking out of Germany. More than convenience alone, travelling with a Rail & Fly ticket also brings you plenty of other benefits. Please note: Rail & Fly is currently not available for online booking. Please contact us by email at dach_reservations@singaporeair.com.sg or by phone for a corresponding booking. Affordable fares Save time and money by getting your train tickets from Rail & Fly, where you can find the most competitive rail fares all

data.text: @zxsim96 or by phone via +49 69 174 156 59 (Monday to Friday: 08.00 h - 18.00 h (German) / 24/7 service for English language only) for a corresponding booking. You may visit https://t.co/ARdJKLfiNH for more information. Thank you. (2/2)
